title: VERBATIM: More Russian cyber attacks on U.S. elections 'likely'
text:
VERBATIM: More Russian cyber attacks on U.S. elections 'likely' 11:40am EST - 01:01 
U.S. Director of National Intelligence Dan Coats said that Russia, as well as other foreign entities, were ''likely'' to pursue more cyber attacks on U.S. and European elections.   
U.S. Director of National Intelligence Dan Coats said that Russia, as well as other foreign entities, were "likely" to pursue more cyber attacks on U.S. and European elections.  //reut.rs/2srYUEL
